desc: We are a PUBLIC shop supplying thoughtfully considered reusable and refillable options that result in less waste. Shop for zero waste, low waste, and sustainable goods to complement your lifestyle. Bring your own container and refill with non-toxic cleaning, laundry, and personal care supplies.

layout.text:
WE CARRY REFILLS WE USE, BY BRANDS THAT
ALIGN WITH OUR VALUES,
AND ARE TRUSTED BY OUR CUSTOMERS.
